definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: The influence of flume tank parameters on ship rolling are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 槽型減搖水艙尺度的變化對船橫搖運動有一定的影響。

sentences.english: The simultaneous interferences of wave and slip of inside vehicles intensify rolling of ro-ro ship, which is one of the important reasons for ship overturn.
sentences.chinese: 波浪和內部滑動車輛共同作用，使滾裝船的橫搖加劇。

sentences.english: C. protect the vessel from slamming against piers D. reduce the rolling of the vessel.
sentences.chinese: 船上安裝的舭龍骨減少船舶的橫搖。
